spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room adjacencies are highly accurate. Most doors and windows are placed correctly according to the 2D reference. Minor docking for the orientation of the Laundry and Bathroom entry doors which appear slightly simplified or reversed compared to the floor plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent adherence. The roof is removed, all rooms are present without hallucinations, and the model is perfectly isolated on a dark neutral background with no text or measurement lines.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is very precise, following the block-style layout of the floor plan accurately. The laundry machines and kitchen island details are particularly well-translated. Minor deduction for the desk orientation in Bedroom 2.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The render follows the low-poly style with flat shading perfectly. The lighting is soft and ambient without being photorealistic. The camera angle is an ideal 45-degree isometric perspective.

detected_errors.description: Minor door orientation discrepancy in the Hall/Laundry/Bathroom transition area.
Slight variation in the orientation/type of the desk fixture in Bedroom 2.
